Entries.DialogueText: Well, well, well... Look who's made it to my secret walnut room.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, well, well... Look who's made it to my secret walnut room.

Entries.DialogueText: Even though you only needed a fraction of the walnuts to gain full access to the island, you decided to push yourself further.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even though you only needed a fraction of the walnuts to gain full access to the island, you decided to push yourself further.

Entries.DialogueText: Your desire to enter this secret door was so strong, that you went above and beyond to get inside.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your desire to enter this secret door was so strong, that you went above and beyond to get inside.

Entries.DialogueText: That drive is what sets you apart, kid. You've got a very special energy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That drive is what sets you apart, kid. You've got a very special energy.

Entries.DialogueText: You weren't under the impression that the challenge ended here, were you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You weren't under the impression that the challenge ended here, were you?

Entries.DialogueText: No... Hah. Hah. Hah... In fact, the challenge has just begun.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No... Hah. Hah. Hah... In fact, the challenge has just begun.

Entries.DialogueText: On your left, you'll find a board with some very interesting opportunities.
Entries.DisplayPattern: On your left, you'll find a board with some very interesting opportunities.

Entries.DialogueText: These challenges, which I've designed just for you, will push you to your very limit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: These challenges, which I've designed just for you, will push you to your very limit.

Entries.DialogueText: However, if you can successfully conquer my challenges, you'll earn an exclusive currency... I call them 'Qi Gems'
Entries.DisplayPattern: However, if you can successfully conquer my challenges, you'll earn an exclusive currency... I call them 'Qi Gems'

Entries.DialogueText: Just don't put 'em in your mouth, kid... They're highly radioactive. Heh. heh. heh...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just don't put 'em in your mouth, kid... They're highly radioactive. Heh. heh. heh...

Entries.DialogueText: You can use the machine on your right to trade these Qi Gems for rare and powerful rewards.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can use the machine on your right to trade these Qi Gems for rare and powerful rewards.

Entries.DialogueText: Yes... I have a feeling someone like you will enjoy this, very much...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes... I have a feeling someone like you will enjoy this, very much...

Entries.DialogueText: Now, if you'll excuse me... I have important business to attend to.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, if you'll excuse me... I have important business to attend to.
